features: 【SELFIE STICK TRIPOD WITH WIRELESS REMOTE】3 in 1 selfie stick tripod with built-in wireless remote (max range:33ft ), allows you to take a selfie and you could also separate the controller to take group photos during parties, graduation, wedding, and exploring places.

【60mAh LITHIUM BATTERY & NON-SLIP FPPD PAD & ALUMINUM ALLOY】Internal 60mAh rechargeable lithium battery can capture up to 60000 selfies after being full charge within 45 - 60 minutes. Aluminum alloy tripod with non-slip foot pad that helps the tripod legs to keep it in place, hence giving you a more stable tripod while recording videos.

【ADJUSTABLE ANGLE & PORTABLE PHONE HOLDER】7sections telescoping stick,Extendable length from 8.7 inches to 43.3 inches so you can choose your desired length.Compact pocket size design,Super lightweight Aluminum alloy material, which is easy to carry. With 360°rotation, you simply twist the cradle head or phone holder to take photos, video call or live broadcasting , to meet your different needs, or situation.

【IDEAL GOPRO INSTALLATION】 1/4 screw and gopro adapter for installing Gopro. For travel, family and friends reunions, trips, as well as hiking, snowboarding, skiing, snorkeling. No matter what kind of indoor or outdoor activities.

【LIFETIME QUALITY CARE 】 Comfortable ABS material handle and aluminum alloy shaft selfie stick tripod packaged with micro charging cable, not only light but also corrosion resistant and strong. KOVIO awards 30 days money free back, 18 months seller warranty and a lifetime support dedicate to assure your long-term enjoyment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We use this stick for a lot more than selfies. It is a wonderful, simple, reliable, sturdy and durable product. It does what it says it is supposed to do. Keep in mind that mono-sticks won't stand up to a lot of wind and need to be on really flat ground when fully extended. That's a reasonable expectation. This stick is so great for family and friend get-togethers, nature scenes, and getting great shots in difficult/blocked settings. A+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful! light weight and small I can keep in my everyday purse. It can be a selfie stick, a short tripod, or a tall standing one. No loafing around something huge. How great is that? I really think everyone should have one of these. I gave mine to my cousin with a toddler to capture everything and take pictures easier. I'll get it again and give some as gifts. Thank you for designing it so well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Update : even thou mine came unusable/defected, they were very kind and responded really quickly to my emails. They tried to send me a new one but with the covid and the situation going on there was a little bit of a problem. So they gave me a different option and that's to refund me which I was okay with that too. Great customer service and customer care. I understand things happen and I'm just glad they provided solutions to this situation. Thank you customer service for your time and help.Old review : I only used it once and I wasn't even handling it hard and it broke.It arrived nicely packaged and on time. Unfortunately, it didn't work.It's lightweight and very easy to use, remote control works fine and it disconnect when you're not using for long period of time but click on the button couple times then it will reconnect itself.It's not sturdy I give it zero stars. Easy to use 3 stars because it broke as I was trying to extend it. Remote 5stars it was easy and worked with my note 9.They reply to me and willing to give me a new one if I submit pictures to proof it, so here it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Me ha servido de mucho, muy funcional, lo compré para nuestro primer Eurotrip en familia, tomamos muchas selfies con éste tripode y toda clase de fotos, lo recomiendo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, fair price and fast shipping
reviews.reviewText: Great product, fair price and fast shipping

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for the money
reviews.reviewText: Great extention. Very happy with the sturdiness and length of travel of the extention. Remote works nicely. I wish the holder could be rotated and locked but it works ok as is... and also wish the tripod had some kind of lock and grip set up. It can be a little awkword to hold at times. Like I said, for the money it's my first selfie stick and I think I'll get some use out of it when fishing and kayaking come back around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This selfie stick is very convenient to take anywhere you go to take the perfect pictures. It can fit in your bag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is not a good selfie stick.
reviews.reviewText: Do not use this as a selfie stick. My phone keeps falling off and it does NOT secure your phone from falling off. It does have a fixture that secures your phone to the selfie stick BUT it sucks and doesn't work. I guess you can use it as a tripod at least but your phone will either be tilted a little downwards or upwards a bit if you don't mind that but if there is to many movements going around you your phone will fall off easy. I give it 1 star because I bought for taking selfies and making small videos for my family and I want to properly record myself in different angles and this selfie stick doesn't do that.Update: tried to return it but forgot about it after 2 months later so I couldn't return it or do anything with it so I threw it away.
Me gusto que es muy práctico. Fácil de usar y cómodo para llevar personalmente.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es hat eine sehr gute Qualität

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It's steady .holds the phone perfectly and so easy to use ..the detachable button to take photos is so easy to marry up with your phone

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente acorde a lo que necesito
reviews.reviewText: Me encantó bastante portable y una buena longitud para el modo trípode.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 22, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I’m using this for remote teaching and it’s brilliant. I like the fact that it’s adaptable and can be used as a small tripod as well as a selfie stick. Very impressed !
